title: Drawing, "Lunette: Sculpture", 1812–13
medium: Pen and brown ink with brown wash over black chalk and traces of graphite on laid paper
inscribed: Caption on top in black chalk: "scultura"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman works at inscription of herm. At left, minerva seated looking on. Boy stands at right by pedestal, drawing or writing upon tablet. Paintings, tools, sculptures lean against wall. Caption on top: "scultura".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lunette: Sculpture", 1812–13.
1812–13. Pen and brown ink with brown wash over black chalk and traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1656.
